summary: A minor car accident drives two rival aluminum-siding salesmen to the ridiculous extremes of man versus man in 1963 Baltimore.
cast: Richard Dreyfuss|Danny DeVito|Barbara Hershey|John Mahoney|Jackie Gayle|Stanley Brock|Seymour Cassel|Bruno Kirby|J.T. Walsh|Richard Portnow|Matt Craven|Alan Blumenfeld|Brad Sullivan|Michael Tucker|Deirdre O'Connell|Sheila McCauley|Michael Willis|Penny Nichols|Susan Duvall|David DeBoy|Florence Moody|Myron Citronbaum|Ralph Tabakin|Norma Posner|Walt MacPherson|William C. Godsey|Roland Gift|David Steele|Andy Cox|Sharon Ziman|Lois Raymond Munchel|Kathy Jones|Cindy Geppi|Ellen Sills|Mary Morgan|Marcia Herr|Karen Barth|Sharon Crofoot|Geri Lynn Kelbaugh|Lisa Ford|Becky Weidner|Patti Lennon-Potter|Shirley Ann Wilson|Joshua Billings|Jeffrey Moser|Freddie Stevens|Bill Danoff|Katherine Ellis|Eva Jean Berg|Todd Jackson|Barbara Rappaport|Theodore Goldman|Kathleen Goldpaugh|Brian Costantini|Jack Larravide|Herb Levinson|Chuck Varesko
title: Dos estafadores y una mujer
